title: Disable Auto-fll.
body: Kept getting jg and support for the past 5 queue. I want my role to be chosen. I kept mid for a reason. not to be disregarded please allow this to happen.

replies.body:
The alternative is exceptionally long queue times and/or poor matchmaking and queue health. Especially on smaller regions like OCE, auto-fill is a necessary measure to prevent queues from deteriorating badly.

It only takes one game of fill/support to get autofill protection, and it doesn't take much to learn a tank support to cover those games. That is the best advice I can offer.
THIS IS THE 20TH TIME I HAVENT GOT MID WHAT IS THIS
Mid is a highly contested role at the moment, so if it's your first pick you're going to be seeing it less.

I want my lane I requested for it so dont waste my time on another role thanks
'

Riot aren't going to force everyone into hour-long queues just so a small percentage of players who only enjoy one role can always get it. Ultimately, this is a multiplayer game and there have to be compromises or *everyone* suffers.

If you really hate playing other roles that much, play at quieter times and/or dodge when you don't get mid.
